greeting.dev: My name is Patryk and I’m
greeting.content: You might be interested in checking the list of my skills . Don’t forget to have a glimpse at my projects. Currently I’m looking for new challenges so if you have one - contact me

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: I want to show you some of my projects that I have completed in my spare time, unfortunately I cannot boast of commercial projects.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I’m open for new opportunities/cooperation. If you have something for me, we should talk
